nodes.text: Gret Deljeevo was a Human male underboss of the Blast Crew gang operating in the Free Zone, a black market on Asylum, a space station in Wild Space functioning as a shadowport. Armed with a blaster shotgun, vibrosword and a jump pack-like device, Deljeevo fought in a gang war with the Starbolts in 3631 BBY. He was killed by the Commander and HK-55, who were searching for a member of Koth Vortena's crew, Tora.
Gret Deljeevo appears in Chapter VI: Asylum in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 digital expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
